source: TEXT_STMBDZ501_02752_SEQ_00<tab>This Oroniri youth is most grateful to the Qestir.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ501_02752_SEQ_00<tab>再会の市のオロニル族の青年は、頼みたいことがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ501_02752_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Baidur and obtain a can of horse milk.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ501_02752_TODO_00<tab>バイドゥルと話して<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8D7301 /var>を入手

source: TEXT_STMBDZ501_02752_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Chambui and obtain a drumstick of beast meat.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ501_02752_TODO_01<tab>チャンブイと話して<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8D7401 /var>を入手

source: TEXT_STMBDZ501_02752_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Uto and obtain smoked fish.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ501_02752_TODO_02<tab>ウトウと話して<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8D7501 /var>を入手

source: TEXT_STMBDZ501_02752_TODO_03<tab>Deliver the food to the Oroniri youth.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ501_02752_TODO_03<tab>オロニル族の青年に食材を渡す

source: TEXT_STMBDZ501_02752_ORONIRMAN02752_000_000<tab>There is a matter I require your help with.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ501_02752_ORONIRMAN02752_000_000おい、そこのお前。
暇なら、ちょっと手伝ってくれ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ501_02752_ORONIRMAN02752_000_001<tab>I want to show my appreciation to the Qestir for creating Reunion. The marketplace allows us both to trade and communicate with the other tribes. We would have struggled to do either before Reunion was set up.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ501_02752_ORONIRMAN02752_000_001この再会の市は、物流や経済を担うだけでなく、
辺り一帯の部族の交流の場でもある。
そこで、市をつくったケスティル族を労おうと思ってな。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ501_02752_ORONIRMAN02752_000_002<tab>After speaking with my fellow traders, we decided that we would host a banquet for the Qestir. However, three of them are still yet to deliver their food for the feast.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ501_02752_ORONIRMAN02752_000_002出店者に協力を募り、彼らに料理を振る舞ってやることにしたが、
まだ食材を届けにきていない連中がいてな……。
そいつらから、食材を受け取ってきてくれ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ501_02752_ORONIRMAN02752_000_003<tab>I am still waiting on Baidur, Chambui, and Uto. Please, seek them out and tell them you wish to discuss the banquet.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ501_02752_ORONIRMAN02752_000_003カコール族の「バイドゥル」とダズカル族の「チャンブイ」、
イサリ村の「ウトウ」の3人から貰ってきてほしい。
食材の件だと言えば、伝わるはずだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ501_02752_ORONIRMAN02752_000_004<tab>I am still waiting on Baidur, Chambui, and Uto. Please, seek them out and tell them you wish to discuss the banquet.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ501_02752_ORONIRMAN02752_000_004カコール族の「バイドゥル」とダズカル族の「チャンブイ」、
イサリ村の「ウトウ」の3人から貰ってきてほしい。
食材の件だと言えば、伝わるはずだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ501_02752_BAIDUR_000_010<tab>Oh, my apologies for being so late. We Kahkol are still few in number and it took somewhat longer than anticipated to gather what we required.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ501_02752_BAIDUR_000_010ありゃ、手間かけさせて、すまないなぁ。
カコールは新興部族で、人手も足りないから、
少し手間取っちゃったんだー。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ501_02752_BAIDUR_000_011<tab>However, I can assure you it will have been worth the wait! I made sure to collect only the finest ingredients to show our gratitude to the Qestir.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ501_02752_BAIDUR_000_011けど、時間がかかったぶん、いいものを持ってきたよ。
ケスティル族には、感謝しているからね。
うちらみたいな弱小部族のため、市を作ってくれてさ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ501_02752_CHAMBUI_000_020<tab>Ah, the banquet? Do not worry, my contribution is ready. I have been incredibly busy of late and it completely slipped my mind.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ501_02752_CHAMBUI_000_020ああ、食材の件だね？
用意はしてたんだが、客の相手をしていて、
渡しに行くヒマがなかったんだよ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ501_02752_CHAMBUI_000_021<tab>Our tribe's hunters are so skilled we often have more food than we know what to do with. Having somewhere like Reunion where we can trade our unnecessary meat is a great help to us.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ501_02752_CHAMBUI_000_021ダズカルの女は、大草原いちの狩人でね。
狩りが上手くいきすぎて、食えないほど肉が手に入ることもある。
大地の恵みを無駄にしないため、市を作ってくれて大助かりだよ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ501_02752_UTO_000_030<tab>My apologies for the delay. Though I think the Qestir will enjoy what I have brought: smoked fish straight from Isari.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ501_02752_UTO_000_030渡しに行くのを忘れてたわ、ごめんなさい。
でも、極上の干物をイサリ村から運んであるよ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ501_02752_UTO_000_031<tab>I would normally not go to such lengths, but the Qestir have done so much for us.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ501_02752_UTO_000_031うちの祖母がつくった干物は、絶品よ。
やっぱりケスティル族の人たちには、
一番いい物を食べてもらいたいからね。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ501_02752_UTO_000_032<tab>The mere fact they allow non-Xaela into Reunion is truly commendable. No doubt their generosity is motivated by trade, but I would be lying if I said it was not the reason that I too come here.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ501_02752_UTO_000_032彼らは、私みたいな異国の人にも分け隔てなく接してくれる。
なんでも、外の人と交流するために、この市を開いたそうよ。
大草原の品々と、外の特産品を交換するためにね。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ501_02752_ORONIRMAN02752_100_040<tab>Were you able to find all three traders?
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ501_02752_ORONIRMAN02752_100_040例の3人から、食材は受け取ったか？
すべてそろったのなら、俺に渡せ。

TEXT_STMBDZ501_02752_ORONIRMAN02752_000_040ふむ、皆それぞれ、自慢の一品を持ってきたようだな。
我らオロニル族ほどではないとはいえ、
ケスティル族の人望も、なかなかのものだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ501_02752_ORONIRMAN02752_000_041<tab>Have you ever heard why the Qestir founded Reunion? They say a Qestiri child died from an illness that would have been treatable with the right medicine. Alas, the Qestir had no means of procuring the cure at the time.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ501_02752_ORONIRMAN02752_000_041その昔、彼らの子どもが病気で倒れた際、
薬師を探し出せず、亡くなるという悲しい出来事があった。
この市は、その後悔から作られたそうだが、知っていたか？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ501_02752_ORONIRMAN02752_000_042<tab>As you say, there are plenty of other popular theories that may be true. The Qestir are hardly going to open their mouths and tell us which is correct after all.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ501_02752_ORONIRMAN02752_000_042なんと、それぞれ違う理由を話していたのか！
……ケスティル族は無口ゆえ、
みな勝手に解釈しているだけなのかもしれないな。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ501_02752_ORONIRMAN02752_000_043<tab>Not that it really matters a great deal. We owe them a huge debt regardless.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ501_02752_ORONIRMAN02752_000_043まぁ、市が作られた理由は、もはや気にすることではない。
我々は受けた恩を、必ず返すだけだ。
お前にも、きちんと報酬は出すから、安心しろ。
